item.title: FIFA’s Leader Often Flatters Trump. Now, He’s Awarding a Peace Prize.
item.description: Gianni Infantino, head of soccer’s governing body, has been ingratiating himself with the president to help ensure a successful 2026 World Cup.

item.title: Trump Administration Says Europe Faces ‘Civilizational Erasure’
item.description: America’s goal should be “to help Europe correct its current trajectory,” the administration said in its new National Security Strategy.

item.title: On Pope Leo’s Visit to Lebanon and Turkey, A.I. Was a Frequent Concern
item.description: On his first trip as pontiff, Leo XIV predictably called for peace and unity. But he also addressed technology’s promise and pitfalls.

item.title: How Batteries Got Cheaper and Made the Electric Grid More Reliable

item.title: Putin Basks in Praise From Modi on India Visit
